plot: Through two unique female personae the film suggests a metaphysical idea of the present as ever recurring, since the temptations, which the human soul faces, are always the same.
title: Az Sam Ti
plot_es: Through two unique female personae the film suggests a metaphysical idea of the present as ever recurring, since the temptations, which the human soul faces, are always the same.
plot_en: Through two unique female personae the film suggests a metaphysical idea of the present as ever recurring, since the temptations, which the human soul faces, are always the same.
